data.text: @Steve_Jones31 @PublicHealthW Check it out for yourself. I'm not your assistant.
@philpmj @PublicHealthW So you don’t self administer then?
@Steve_Jones31 @PublicHealthW You need to read about how it works.

@philpmj @PublicHealthW Used it in lockdown 1 - again, the question about self administered you seemed to have ignored - you can tell it IF you are feeling unwell… easily manipulated like this whole charade

@Steve_Jones31 @PublicHealthW If you're not familiar with the way it works, you might want to look into it. The Zoe app is now accepted by many experts as the best indication of daily cases, which are about 4 times higher than the official data.
@philpmj @PublicHealthW What? Don’t you self answer a set of questions or is that something else? We are not doctors…. Waking up with a headache may not be covid
@Steve_Jones31 @PublicHealthW They have a sophisticated method of ensuring that their estimates are consistent with ONS surveys of prevalence.
@philpmj @PublicHealthW That’s because it’s self administered - so if you feel not 100% you can put it down a that doesn’t mean you have covid….

@PublicHealthW Can we go back to simply having a cough, cold, flu, lurgy, sore throat, sniffles, bad chest etc?
It might reduce red tape and save the taxpayer a few bob.
